alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 20 at 7:12PM CST until November 20 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Southeastern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 711 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Little Springs, or 7 miles southeast of Meadville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Mccall Creek and Little Springs around 715 PM CST. Center Point around 720 PM CST. West Lincoln around 725 PM CST. Vaughn around 730 PM CST. Brookhaven around 735 PM CST. Bogue Chitto around 740 PM CST. Enterprise around 745 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
